content.rendered:
February 5 to 7, 2025 | Bangalore

India's Biggest GenAI Summit for developers

Edition
0 th
Attendees
0 +
Speakers
0 +
Organizations
0 +
Reserve a Spot
Contact us

We’re excited to put on another world-class event as we open the doors to MLDS 2025 and continue to collaborate with a range of brands to evolve the event experience for our attendees, parters and speakers alike.

working together

To explore sponsorship opportunities with MLDS 2025, please write to info@aimmediahouse.com

MLDS 2025 is Powered by

AI Partner

Platinum Sponsor

Gold Sponsors

Silver Sponsors

Partner with MLDS

Showcase your brand to our community of Tech Leaders and Developers. FILL IN THE FORM BELOW OR WRITE TO US AT INFO@ANALYTICSINDIAMAG.COM

Our Past Sponsors

Every year, more than 20 organizations sponsor MLDS.
To know more details, write to info@aimmediahouse.com

OUR COMMUNITY

MLDS attracts a diverse audience of developers, AI engineers, data scientists, and tech leaders from all corners of the industry.

Leverage our extensive network and expertise to connect with top talent across various domains and build lasting relationships.

FUTURE TALENT

Showcase your brand to an engaged audience of developers, innovators, and thought leaders from fields like Generative AI, software engineering, and more—all eager to expand their network and explore new opportunities.

India's Biggest GenAi Summit for developers

This was my first ever ML summit and I couldn’t have asked for more. I feel sad for those who missed all these precious opportunities. The Machine Learning Saga was so inspirational that my exuberance was through the roof.

Noel Mathew Cherian

KGXperience

Thank you Analytics India Magazine for the opportunity and also thanks to the attendees for their time and thoughtful follow up discussions!

Jai Kapoor

State Street

It was good and insightful event. Many ideas and approaches in 2 days. Have to explore lot of key notes from different presentations.

Lokeshwaran A

Genpact

My first ever data science conference and it’s been a delight to learn about some great solutions implemented in the industry over the past 2 days. It was nice meeting a few ex-colleagues as well. 
Thanks Analytics India Magazine for organizing it so well. Looking forward to the next one.

Deepika Kaushal

Piramal Capital & Housing Finance

“Generative AI is the next big thing in artificial intelligence. It has the potential to revolutionize the way we create content, design products, and solve problems.”

~ Gary Marcus
